title: IMMZD5DTBCGContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
description: JSON Schema for IMMZD5DTBCGContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The client has history of severe allergic reactions-60
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#BCG vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.-67
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The client is exposed to immunosuppressive treatment-72
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client's age is more than or equal to 1 year-14
narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD5DTBCGContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD5DTBCGContraindicationsVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
